games.title: Super Mario Bros.
games.description: A classic platform game where you play as Mario and save Princess Toadstool from Bowser.

games.title: The Legend of Zelda
games.description: An action-adventure game where you play as Link and explore the land of Hyrule to rescue Princess Zelda and defeat Ganon.

games.title: Mega Man 2
games.description: A side-scrolling action game where you play as Mega Man and defeat robot bosses to save the world from Dr. Wily.

games.title: Final Fantasy
games.description: A role-playing game where you play as the Warrior of Light and save the world from chaos and darkness.

games.title: Elden Ring
games.description: A vast world where open fields with a variety of situations and huge dungeons with complex and three-dimensional designs are seamlessly connected. As you explore, the joy of discovering unknown and overwhelming threats await you, leading to a high sense of accomplishment.

games.title: Dark Souls 3
games.description: As fires fade and the world falls into ruin, journey into a universe filled with more colossal enemies and environments. Players will be immersed into a world of epic atmosphere and darkness through faster gameplay and amplified combat intensity

games.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. Before you stands a war-torn, monster-infested continent you can explore at will. Your current contract? Tracking down Ciri  the Child of Prophecy, a living weapon that can alter the shape of the world.

games.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
games.description: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail. The Special Edition includes the critically acclaimed game and add-ons with all-new features like remastered art and effects, volumetric god rays, dynamic depth of field, screen-space reflections, and more.

games.title: Mass Effect 3
games.description: Earth is burning. The Reapers have taken over, and other civilizations are falling like dominoes. Lead the final fight to save humanity and take back Earth from these terrifying machines as Commander Shepard.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are outlaws on the run. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive. As deepening internal divisions threaten to tear the gang apart, Arthur must make a choice between his own ideals and loyalty to the gang who raised him.
